name: Tank (itch) (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
This is my 4th game I made it's pretty simple and the soldiers don't do anything so keep that in mind.

The mines are placed in different spots so before not touch it or the other player gets a point also the time limit is 60 secs good luck playing 2 players.

The controls are

Player 1 W-Move forward D-Turn right A-Turn left S-Move backwards F-Shoot

Player 2 Up arrow-Move forward Right arrow-Move right Left arrow-Move left Back-Move backwards (/)-Shoot

That's pretty much it and have a good day!
